path.style: fill: none; stroke: #ececec; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 32;

polyline.style: fill: none; stroke: #c68c10; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 32;

line.style: fill: none; stroke: #c68c10; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 32;
